title: Fox Campaigns
author: Fox Campaigns
content: Dragon Race is a play-to-earn PVP mythical creatures racing game set in the metaverse. Players have the chance to reveal dragon eggs, which hatch into novel mythical dragons. These mythical creatures are free to partake in the race and acquire prizes. Players can also generate value by renting their own dragons or displaying them in D. Jurassic Park.Learn more about the Dragon Race1. Bounty Campaign Starts on: 06 October - 02 November (4 weeks)2. $15,000 worth of DRAGACE tokens will be distributed within 2 months after the bounty is over.3. Complete tasks and make reports every week in this thread! 4. Connect with Dragon Race in social media;- Twitter: https://twitter.com/DragonRaceio- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Dragonraceio/- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dragonraceio/- Telegram: https://t.me/Dragonraceio- Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/dragonraceio- Discord: https://discord.com/invite/Gb6kzDCu- GitHub: https://github.com/dragonraceio- Learn more about Dragon Race:  https://dragonrace.io/5. Tokens will be distributed depending on the quality of your work.6. Spammers, cheaters, bots, and similar participants will be banned immediately!7. Follow all the bounty groups/channels to get support and to stay updated;- Bounty Group:  https://t.me/dragonrace_bounty- Foxcampaigns Group: https://t.me/foxcampaigns- Foxcampaigns Channel: https://t.me/foxannouncementsNote:If you are disqualified for any reason, you will NOT receive any rewards. All rights reserved by Fox Campaigns and the Dragon Race team. We can make any changes to the campaign rules, if applicable.By joining these campaigns, you're accepting these above terms.Code:Proof of authentication;Telegram username:Campaigns applied:BSC wallet address:$15,000 worth of DRAGACE tokens will be distributed in this campaign. Only participants with quality work(s) will be rewarded;- Signature Campaign: 25%- Twitter Campaign: 23%- Content Campaign: 20%- Facebook Campaign: 10%- Instagram Campaign: 10%- Telegram Campaign: 7%- Discord Campaign: 5% Note:There is a limit of 600 participants in this campaign.Tokens:-1 - 10 stakes depending on the content quality (video/article).Rules:- Videos must have at least 200 views to qualify.- We accept original videos only with at least 3 minutes.- Only English language is accepted in videos and articles.- Write a good description about Dragon Race in your video. - Videos with no user's voice will not be accepted.- Attach Dragon Race links in your video description and articles.- Only YouTube videos will be accepted!- 2 videos and 2 articles per person are allowed.- Articles must have at least 50 views to qualify.- We accept original articles only with at least 500 words.- Submit articles on Medium, Steem, Linkedin, ReadCash.  - Visit dragonrace.io to learn more about it and write your articles.JOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow Dragon Race Twitter account: @DragonRaceio3. Make 1 post and 1 repost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 tweets, 5 retweets)5. Twitter accounts will be audited, only those with real followers will be accepted!6. Use these hashtags; #Dragonrace #Dragace #SAFU #PINKSALE #foxcampaigns #GameFi #trade #Binance #BSC #Presale #FairLaunchJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Twitter Report ]Twitter Profile Link:Week #:Tweet Link #1:Tweet Link #2:Tweet Link #3:Tweet Link #4:Tweet Link #5:Retweet Link #1: Retweet Link #2:Retweet Link #3:Retweet Link #4:Retweet Link #5:Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow Dragon Race Facebook account: @Dragonraceio3. Make 1 post and 1 repost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 tweets, 5 retweets)5. Use these hashtags; #Dragonrace #Dragace #SAFU #PINKSALE #foxcampaigns #GameFi #trade #Binance #BSC #Presale #FairLaunchJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Facebook Report ]Facebook Profile Link:Week #:Post Link #1:Post Link #2:Post Link #3:Post Link #4:Post Link #5:Share Link #1: Share Link #2:Share Link #3:Share Link #4:Share Link #5:Stakes:- 300 to 1000 followers: 4 stakes per week- 1001 to 2500 followers: 8 stakes per week- 2501 to 5500 followers: 12 stakes per week- 5501 to 10,000 followers: 16 stakes per week- 10,000+ followers: 20 stakes per weekRules:1. Have at least 300 followers to participate.2. Must follow Dragon Race Instagram account: @dragonraceio3. Make 1 post and 1 repost, per day. Submit report weekly to receive stakes.4. Minimum of 10 posts per week (5 tweets, 5 retweets)5. Use these hashtags; #Dragonrace #Dragace #SAFU #PINKSALE #foxcampaigns #GameFi #trade #Binance #BSC #Presale #FairLaunchJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Instagram Report ]Instagram Profile Link:Week #:Post Link #1:Post Link #2:Post Link #3:Post Link #4:Post Link #5:Share Link #1: Share Link #2:Share Link #3:Share Link #4:Share Link #5:Stakes:- 1 quality post: 1 stake.- 20 one-time stakes for wearing Dragon Race avatar and name.- Wear the Avatar until the end of the campaign and you will get stakes.- Download AvatarRules:1. Must join Dragon Race Telegram group: https://t.me/Dragonraceio2. Write posts in the official Dragon Race group (only quality posts accepted)3. If you write any spam message you will be banned immediately4. Max posts per day: 2, Max posts per week: 105. You can ask questions about Dragon Race in the official group, but do not Spam!6. You will not be paid if you remove the avatar before the end of the campaign!7. DO NOT USE HASHTAGS IN YOUR TELEGRAM POSTS!JOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Telegram Report ]Telegram Account Link:Week #:Post Link #1:Post Link #2:Post Link #3:Post Link #4:Post Link #5:Post Link #6:Post Link #7:Post Link #8:Post Link #9:Post Link #10:Stakes:- 2 stakes per one quality post- Maximum 10 posts per weekRules:1. Write your posts in the Dragon Race server: https://discord.com/invite/Gb6kzDCu2. If you write any spam post you will be banned immediately3. Max posts per day: 2, Max posts per week: 104. You can ask questions about Dragon Race in their server, but do not Spam!5. If you have any problem with this campaign, ask in the bounty group!6. We count only 2 posts per day, make report weekly to receive stakesJOIN HERE   -   SPREADSHEETS Code:[ Discord Report ]Discord Profile Link:Week #:Post Link #1:Post Link #2:Post Link #3:Post Link #4:Post Link #5:Post Link #6:Post Link #7:Post Link #8:Post Link #9:Post Link #10:Stakes:- Member: 8 stakes per week- Full member: 12 stakes per week- Sr. Member: 16 stakes per week- Legendary/Hero: 20 stakes per weekRules:- Make a minimum of 10 constructive posts per week- Only English posts will be counted- Posts must be at least 150 characters in length- Spam, Offtopic, Bounty reports, and subs are not counted- You MUST wear the avatar and signature- Red trust accounts are not accepted.- Multiple accounts per user are not permittedSIGNATURES:Legendary / Hero
